label: TieredMenu
description: TieredMenu is an input component that provides real-time suggestions when being typed.

methods.label: Methods
methods.description: Defines methods that can be accessed by the component's reference.

values.name: getElement
values.description: Used to get container element.

values.name: toggle
values.description: Toggles the visibility of the popup menu.

values.name: hide
values.description: Used to hide the popup.

values.name: show
values.description: Used to show the popup.

values.name: isVisible
values.description: ture if the popup is visible.

props.label: TierredMenuProps
props.description: Defines valid properties in TieredMenu component. In addition to these, all properties of HTMLDivElement can be used in this component.

values.name: appendTo
values.description: DOM element instance where the overlay panel should be mounted. Valid values are any DOM Element and 'self'. The self value is used to render a component where it is located.

values.name: autoZIndex
values.description: Whether to automatically manage layering.

values.name: baseZIndex
values.description: Whether to automatically manage layering.

values.name: breakpoint
values.description: The breakpoint to define the maximum width boundary when responsiveness is enabled.

values.name: class
values.description: CSS classes to add to root element.

values.name: model
values.description: An array of menuitems.

values.name: popup
values.description: Defines if menu would displayed as a popup.

values.name: pt
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

values.name: ptOptions
values.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

values.name: scrollHeight
values.description: Maximum height of the options panel on responsive mode.

values.name: style
values.description: Style to add to root element.

values.name: submenuIcon
values.description: Icon of the submenu.

values.name: unstyled
values.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

callbacks.label: Callbacks
callbacks.description: Defines callbacks that determine the behavior of the component based on a given condition or report the actions that the component takes.

values.name: onBlur
values.description: Callback to invoke when menu loses focus.

values.name: onFocus
values.description: Callback to invoke when menu receives focus.

values.name: onHide
values.description: Callback to invoke when a popup menu is hidden.

values.name: onShow
values.description: Callback to invoke when a popup menu is shown.

values.name: root
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the root's DOM element.

values.name: menu
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the menu's DOM element.

values.name: submenu
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the submenu's DOM element.

values.name: menuitem
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the list item's DOM element.

values.name: action
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the action's DOM element.

values.name: icon
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the icon's DOM element.

values.name: label
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the label's DOM element.

values.name: submenuIcon
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the submenu icon's DOM element.

values.name: separator
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the separator's DOM element.

values.name: content
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the content's DOM element.

types.label: Props types
types.description: Defines types used by properties of the TieredMenu component.

ptContext.label: TieredMenuContext
ptContext.description: Defines current options in TieredMenu component.

values.name: active
values.description: Current active state of menuitem as a boolean.

state.label: TieredMenuState
state.description: Defines current inline state in TieredMenu component.

values.name: attributeSelector
values.description: Current attributeSelector visible state as a string.

values.name: visible
values.description: Current visible state as a boolean.
